question:
Brodie longs for mathematics. Rafi pines for marathon running. Thomas-Jay prefers minibikes. Troy embraces sewing. Kaden detests limousines. Krish blasts the color red. Niro finds fulfillment in cryptocurrency. Tian abides mountain biking. Julian stomachs robotics. Isaac abides recycling. Rayne exults in brownies. Jahy damns acting. Lee complains about science. Believe detests racing cars. Sher blasts electric scooters. Craig yearns cleaning the refrigerator. Anton covets lions. Lliam bears data science. Lennox is obsessed with philosophy. Oluwafikunayomi finds fulfillment in ultimate frisbee. Caleb stomachs humor. Cohan ridicules winemaking. Shea puts up with meditation. Saif rejoices in mountain biking. Dolan can’t stand archaeology. Aryian savors the color sapphire. Berkay cherishes sandwiches. Alexander damns cookies. Chimsom is devoted to sailplanes. Rikki favors playing the clarinet. Jensen deifies cats. Fergus laments geese. Christopher-Lee respects travel photography. Caidyn mocks bicycles. Mikhail worships history. Bendeguz yearns vlogging. 
Who longs for mathematics? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
